intro: ^Ex: I don't think that would be right for you.
^MC: Why are you going? Is it.. something I did?
^Ex: No.\pause I just feel the calling.
^MC: Will you come back? Every now and then? Or maybe we can still communicate, with telepathy?
^Ex: ..I don't think it works that way.
^MC: What does this mean for us..?
^Ex: Evidently this has to be our end.
^MC: And are you sure I can't --
^Ex: I don't think you would survive it.
^MC: Did you even like me at all? Or was this just... some sort of a.. a distraction? Just to pass the time?!
^Ex: Of course I did. This has nothing to do with you.
^MC: Will you miss me at all?
^Ex: I will likely think about you,\pause if I see a rock or a plant or such that has a similar shape to you.\pause Sometimes, it will ache a little bit.
^Ex: But mostly, I will be too occupied with all the discoveries I am making to really feel "sorrow".
^Ex: Do you really want to hear about that?
^MC: What is that, up there?\pause It looks frightening.
^Ex: It's part of all the changes that are happening. Everyone is doing it now.
^MC: But that... that didn't really happen, did it? Between us?
^Ex: But I left you a song. On the coralnet.
